        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Quarkus allows different beans to interact using asynchronous events, enforcing loose-coupling.
          
          
            
            Quarkus allows different beans to interact using asynchronous events, thus promoting loose-coupling.
